txt.en: Aelnir can be found in the city of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should speak with Aelnir.
Roving Threat: Gundlag, the Death Troll
Azruthor's forces venture out of Tarlang's Crown including Gundlag, whose lifeless corpse is controlled by The Dead.
Gundlag can be found somewhere in Western Gondor.\n\nYou should defeat Gundlag.

'The Sorcerers of Umbar have called forth evil spirits to carry out their orders. Fell spirits under the command of Azruthor's forces have possessed the bodies of many slain beasts.\n\n'One such beast was once a cave-troll, Gundlag. Now it is a colossal creature, not of the living. This beast was a menace even before it was corrupted in death. This fell troll must be dealt with before it ventures out of the woods and into a town.'

'I am thankful to hear that the thundering footsteps of Gundlag shall not be heard again.\n\n'I am not one to side with the likes of trolls, but no creature should be invaded by a fell spirit. It is an act of defilement. These Umbarrim will pay for their heinous deeds.'
